title: Riot F*cked Up The Jungle With These Changes... | How These Changes Gonna Impact Your Game

body: i welcome you to a new fresh video in which i will be talking about the new jungle and in what kinda way it will affect the game. so riots idea was a pretty good one, they wanted to keep the junglers more in their own jungle, so laners could trade and farm without being afraid of getting ganked every few seconds. but the way they tried to fixed that issue is actually really horrible!
